doc:
Gladys Ambrose https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gladys_Ambrose 0 Gladys Ambrose (28 December 1930, Everton, Liverpool, Lancashire – 4 July 1998, Knowsley Village, Lancashire) was an English actress of film and television, best known for her role as the gossipy Julia Brogan on the long-running soap opera, Brookside, which she played from 1985 until just before her death from cancer in July 1998 at the age of 67. Gladys_Ambrose ( 28_December_1930 , Everton , Liverpool , Lancashire – 4_July_1998 , Knowsley_Village , Lancashire ) was an_English_actress of film_and_television , best_known for her_role as the_gossipy_Julia_Brogan on the_long-running_soap_opera , Brookside , which she played from 1985 until just before her_death from cancer in July_1998 at the_age of 67 .
